title: NFL Covid-19 Rules and Implications
itunes:title: NFL Covid-19 Rules and Implications
description:
The NFL is warning teams that Covid outbreaks among unvaccinated players could lead to forfeited games and fines. Jason, Barr, and Lynch break down the new policy with Professor Bob Bolland of Penn State University. Plus, they get the player perspective with three-time NFL Pro-Bowl running back Warrick Dunn.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
